TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_A1_01
TestCase.Purpose: Positive test checking the activation of the eID-Client via the "ClientURL" to start an authentication procedure.

TestStep.Description: The "ClientURL" is based on the URL "http://127.0.0.1:24727/eID-Client".
[TC_TOKEN_URL] is a valid https-URL where the TC Token can be retrieved by the eID-Client.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client is activated and starts establishment of channel TLS-1-2 to the TC Token Provider.

TestCase.Postcondition: The browser has invoked the eID-Client and waits for the result of the Online-Authentication.
